title: Looking for a team to Scrim regularly.
body:
QUICKFIRE, is looking for a team to scrim against preferably around Gold-Bronze.

Our team is currently Silver 3 

The roster rankings:

Plat 5
Gold 3
Gold 4
Gold 5
Silver 1
Silver 3

We are a new roster, like any other team still learning and improving while working as a team.

We are all usally online at 4pm - 11pm everyday.

If your team would like to practice against us, please add me on the client.

QUICKFIRE ~

replies.body: Take my advice and play ranked 5's, much easier for practice at this level ;)
